divs: sighting detailstalking to friend\neighbor outside her front porch. i was facing her, she was facing me (she was facing south). she said something like look at that, what are those...i turned and looked in the direction she was pointing. far up in the sky were two solid white cylindrical objects flying from south\southwest to northeast toward nellis afb(?). no sound no wings. black windows(?) on both objects. thought they must have been planes, but no wings at all. this is the 2nd sighting we have had together in 3 days. wth is going on here in vegas?
trends: There have been 229 other sightings in Las Vegas
There were no other sightings in Las Vegas on or around August 12th 2013
Summary: 2 solid white cyllindrical WINGLESS objects in broad daylight, one following the other
